TopicTitle: OS X trying to update to 0.17

Articles.Content:
Downloaded the patcher, doesn't work. I run the script without success. No instructions for the patcher, either.

Downloaded the full file, 418MB and I get a message that I can't get past when I launch:

This is the latest (0.17.0)

The update requires a full download. Press update to open

the KSP store.

The update button is greyed out, the cancel button does nothing.
Reboot it, always does that first run for me.

Well, the patcher is unreliable on OSX, as it relies on Mono, and the Mono compatibility mode of Visual Studio seems not to actually be compatible at all.

As for the full download, it should have worked, it'll generate a settings file on first run if it has write permissions, so check those first, look here for info.
